FuncDef: The reset control-flap command deletes statistics about control-flap on an interface. The reset control-flap command deletes statistics about control-flap on an interface.

ParaDef.Info:
Deletes the penalty of control-flap on an interface to release the interface from the suppressed state.
-

Deletes the number of times interface flapping occurs.
-

Specifies the name of an interface.
-

Specifies the type of an interface.
The value is of the enumerated type.

ExtraInfo: Before collecting traffic statistics on a specific interface within a specific period of time, delete existing traffic statistics on this interface.
